Description: Limestone ostracon with remains of 7 lines of text on the recto and 3 lines on the verso containing a bill or receipt.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Egypt Exploration Fund (probably from the Excavation 1910-11)
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (291-294, pl. 42)
Delattre 2002 / CR de O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II et O.Ashm.Copt. (p.332)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82905) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82905)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 39 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
